snippet.textDisplay: My sincere prayers go out to the loved ones killed or wounded at  the "Tops supermarket" in Buffalo.  It is very sad that an 18 year old can ingest that much hatred at such a young age. I truly believe he was raised among racism and racial hatred for persons of color. The internet is also being blamed for his racist and extremist views but he was already full of hate long before that.  They only thing those sites that he visited did was increase the ignorance he already had in him.  All those lives cut short, "A mind is a terrible thing to waste"

snippet.textDisplay: This whole thing should have been on donkey of the day first thing yesterday, but oh no Charla nem supervisor said on that sad Monday for ur people, were gon slander a black girl, a dumb one no doubt but a black girl nonetheless. Nd then on top of that they were mad respectfull in that segment yesterday wen they were talking about the shooter. I've heard them slander Florida whites for doing less heinous ish, worse than they did ole boy in that segment. THATS WHY DAME SAID BE YOUR OWN BOSS to Charla. I know if Charla was running that station, the buffalo shooter would have been donkey of the day. WHY DR ANDERSON CLAUDE  said we gotta controll our media and narrative. I know Charla is smart nd if i thought this he did to, he just couldn't do anything about it.
